Column.Name: Parent Structure

Label.Text: Any action taken on this defect
Date the action on this defect occured
Any additional action required to resolve the defect

TextCriterion.Text: CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
-- If Contract RecordID is empty, allow Originator Access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
--Check if user is in allocated role or department on parent Contract WHEN ( STEP TO [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the record WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
-- If Contract RecordID is empty, allow Originator Access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
--Check if user is in allocated role or department on parent Contract WHEN ( STEP TO [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(1)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Risk Managers'
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
